CustomField.formula: IF (ISBLANK(amp_dev__Advocate__c), HYPERLINK("apex/" & $Setup.amp_dev__Amp_Settings__c.amp_dev__Package_Namespace__c & "__AmpInviteAdvocate?id=" & Id, "[Send Advocate Invitation]", "_self"), HYPERLINK("https://" & $Setup.amp_dev__Amp_Settings__c.amp_dev__Client_Url__c & "/Advocates/Profile/Frame?id=" & amp_dev__Advocate__r.Name & "&Token=Salesforce", "Advocate Profile", "_blank"))
CustomField.label: Advocate Action [DEPRECATED]
